mean_cn: v.敦促，促使，激励；  adj.迅速的，及时的；准时的
mean_en: to encourage somebody to speak by asking them questions or suggesting words that they could say; to make somebody decide to do something; to cause something to happen;
sentence: My phone prompts me to get out of bed and finish my paper!
sentence_trans: 我的手机敦促我起床写论文！
